import NewArrivals from "../Components/NewArrivals" import Reviews from "../Components/Reviews" import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import { useParams } from "react-router-dom" import { obtenerProductosId } from "../api/productosID" import { useContext } from "react" import { CarritoContext } from "../context/CarritoContext" export default function DetalleProducto() { const {agregarAlCarrito} = useContext(CarritoContext); function opcionAgregar(){ agregarAlCarrito(productos); } const {id} = useParams(); const [productos, setProducto] = useState(null); useEffect(() =>{ obtenerProductosId(id).then(setProducto); }, [id]); if (!productos) return
